      • buildText

        public PTextUnmeasuredType buildText(PTypefaceType in_face,
                                     float in_font_size,
                                     String in_text,
                                     PTextWrapping in_wrap_mode,
                                     float in_wrap_width)
        Description copied from interface: PTextBuilderType

        Build unmeasured text. The text will be wrapped based on the given wrapping mode.

        Specified by:
        buildText in interface PTextBuilderType
        Parameters:
        in_face - The typeface to use
        in_font_size - The font size to use
        in_text - The text
        in_wrap_mode - The text wrapping mode
        in_wrap_width - The text wrapping width
        Returns:
        Unmeasured text based on all of the parameters given so far.

      • setTextureType

        public void setTextureType(PTextureType t)
        Description copied from interface: PTextBuilderType

        Set the texture type that will be used for textures. The default is PTextureType.TEXTURE_TRANSLUCENT_RGBA_NON_PREMULTIPLIED.

        Note that OpenGL ES2 is not capable of supporting almost all of the texture types, and so renderers will typically fall back to PTextureType.TEXTURE_TRANSLUCENT_RGBA_NON_PREMULTIPLIED.

        Specified by:
        setTextureType in interface PTextBuilderType
        Parameters:
        t - The texture type
